title: Ivan Varfolomeyev
text:
Ivan Varfolomeyev (; born 24 March 2004) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">midfielder</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Rukh%20Lviv">Rukh Lviv</a>.
Career.
Born in <a href="Simferopol">Simferopol</a>, Varfolomeyev is a product of the SC Tavriya Simferopol, where his first trainers were <a href="Andriy%20Cheremysin">Andriy Cheremysin</a> and Vitaliy Ponomaryov, and <a href="FC%20Karpaty%20Lviv">FC Karpaty Lviv</a> youth sportive systems.
In September 2020 he was transferred to another team from Lviv – <a href="FC%20Rukh%20Lviv">Rukh</a>, and made his debut for FC Rukh as the second half-time substituted player in the away losing match against <a href="FC%20Shakhtar%20Donetsk">FC Shakhtar Donetsk</a> on 21 February 2021 in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>.
